info.title: IndustryDataLifecycleClient
info.description: API's to manage industry data lifecycle

get.description: Lists all of the available RP operations.

OperationListResponse.description: Response to list operations. It contains a list of resources, supported operations on them and a URL link to get the next set of results.

value.description: List of resources and supported operations on them by the Microsoft.IndustryDataLifecycle resource provider.

nextLink.description: URL to get the next set of operations if there are any.

Operation.description: Resources and supported operations on them.

display.description: The object that represents the operation.

SystemData.description: Metadata pertaining to creation and last modification of the resource.

createdBy.description: The identity that created the resource.

createdByType.description: The type of identity that created the resource.

lastModifiedBy.description: The identity that last modified the resource.

lastModifiedByType.description: The type of identity that last modified the resource.

lastModifiedAt.description: The type of identity that last modified the resource.

Resource.description: Resource object containing common attributes in proxy and tracked resources.

id.description: Fully qualified resource Id for the resource. Ex - /subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/{resourceProviderNamespace}/{resourceType}/{resourceName}

type.description: The type of the resource. Ex- Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines or Microsoft.Storage/storageAccounts.

TrackedResource.description: The resource model definition for a ARM tracked top level resource

location.description: The geo-location where the resource lives

ProxyResource.description: The resource model definition for a ARM proxy resource. It will have everything other than required location and tags

code.description: One of a server-defined set of error codes.

message.description: A human-readable representation of the error.

details.description: An array of details about specific errors that led to this reported error.

innerError.description: An object containing more specific information than the current object about the error.

InnerError.description: Inner error containing list of errors.

code.description: A more specific error code than was provided by the containing error.

innererror.description: An object containing more specific information than the current object about the error.

SubscriptionIdParameter.description: The Azure subscription ID. This is a GUID-formatted string (e.g. 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000)
SubscriptionIdParameter.name: subscriptionId

ResourceGroupNameParameter.description: The name of the resource group. The name is case insensitive.
ResourceGroupNameParameter.name: resourceGroupName

ApiVersionParameter.description: The API version to be used with the HTTP request.
ApiVersionParameter.name: api-version

SelectParameter.description: An OData $select clause. Used to select the properties to be returned in the GET response.
SelectParameter.name: $select

FilterParameter.description: An OData $filter clause. Used to filter results that are returned in the GET response.
FilterParameter.name: $filter
